vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.13;
son of: Issachar (H3485);
brother of: Tola (H8439), Puah (H6312) and Shimron (H8110B); also called Yob (KJV: Job) at Gen.46.13;
Group of ya.shuv (יָשׁוּב "Jashub" H3437H)
§ Jashubites = see Jashub "he will return"
descendants of Jashub of the tribe of Issachar
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Jasub, hijo de Isacar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅述族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 雅述 "他將回轉"
以撒迦支派雅述的後裔(民 26:24)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅述族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 雅述 "他将回转"
以撒迦支派雅述的后裔(民 26:24)
